name: Spirit Of The Animals
description:
Set in a fantasy world wherein technology has advanced in an immeasurable amount, but the number of animal species have been declining to the point of endangering all the animals. An organization have been experimenting on animals to find solutions to preserve them by gathering data on their behavior and anatomy. When suddenly the organization changed its goals and used the experiments to make animal-human hybrids to conquer the world. 

Spirit Of The Animals is a 2D Topdown shooter game where you play as a former scientist who has been modified to be a mystical half-human fox who has magical abilities who wishes to put a stop to the organization and save all the remaining animals.
